name: Rainbow Blast
description:
A platformer where you play as Ada the unicorn and banish bad thoughts by farting rainbows at them!

Music by Malie on SoundCloud

Controls:

-WASD or Arrow keys to move. Gravity is janky, you can just fly

-Press space to fart rainbows

-Press R to restart/reset the level

-Press Esc to quit the game

The game was made at a weekend hackathon in the course of about 6-8 hours, we hope to continue development on the game though
